00006 namespace SimSite3D{
00007 
00008 class HbondBase{
00009 public:
00010 
00011   HbondBase()
00012   {
00013     build_info_map();
00014   }
00015 
00016   virtual ~HbondBase()
00017   {
00018 
00019   }
00020 
00021   void build_info_map()
00022   {
00023     if(A_local_hbond_info.size()) return;
00024 
00025     for(uint i = 0; i < num_new_hbond_triads; ++i){
00026       if(new_hbond_triads[i].residue == MAIN_CHAIN){
00027         for(uint j = 0; j < A_handled_residues.size(); ++j){
00028           if(!new_hbond_triads[i].B == N && !A_handled_residues[j] == PRO)
00029             A_local_hbond_info[A_handled_residues[j]][new_hbond_triads[i].B].push_back(new_hbond_triads[i]);
00030         }
00031       }else
00032         A_local_hbond_info[new_hbond_triads[i].residue][new_hbond_triads[i].B].push_back(new_hbond_triads[i]);
00033     }
00034   }
00035 
00036   static std::vector<residue_type>&
00037   handled_residues()
00038   {
00039     if(A_handled_residues.size() == 0){
00040       A_handled_residues.push_back(ALA);
00041       A_handled_residues.push_back(ARG);
00042       A_handled_residues.push_back(ASN);
00043       A_handled_residues.push_back(ASP);
00044       A_handled_residues.push_back(CYS);
00045       A_handled_residues.push_back(GLN);
00046       A_handled_residues.push_back(GLU);
00047       A_handled_residues.push_back(GLY);
00048       A_handled_residues.push_back(HIS);
00049       A_handled_residues.push_back(ILE);
00050       A_handled_residues.push_back(LEU);
00051       A_handled_residues.push_back(LYS);
00052       A_handled_residues.push_back(MET);
00053       A_handled_residues.push_back(PHE);
00054       A_handled_residues.push_back(PRO);
00055       A_handled_residues.push_back(SER);
00056       A_handled_residues.push_back(THR);
00057       A_handled_residues.push_back(TRP);
00058       A_handled_residues.push_back(TYR);
00059       A_handled_residues.push_back(VAL);
00060     }
00061     return A_handled_residues;
00062   }
00063 
00064   const std::vector<hbond_triad_t>&
00065   get_hbond_info(const residue_type res, const atom_type atom)
00066   { return A_local_hbond_info[res][atom]; }
00067 
00068 
00069 protected:
00070   std::map<residue_type, std::map<atom_type, std::vector<hbond_triad_t> > > 
00071     A_local_hbond_info;
00072 
00073 private:
00074   static std::vector<residue_type> A_handled_residues;
00075 };
